name: Initial N: A King Speaking to Four Men and A Joust between Two Knights
description: Initial N: A King Speaking to Four Men and A Joust between Two Knights; Unknown, Michael Lupi de Çandiu (Spanish, active Pamplona, Spain 1297 - 1305); Northeastern Spain, Spain; about 1290 - 1310; Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 36.5 × 24 cm (14 3/8 × 9 7/16 in.); Ms. Ludwig XIV 6, fol. 255; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
